mapper.select: select cd.CODE_ID ,c.CODE_NAME ,cd.CODE_DETAIL_ID ,cd.CODE_DETAIL_NAME FROM COMMON c, COMMON_DETAIL cd WHERE cd.CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID and cd.CODE_ID = 300
SELECT CD.CODE_ID ,C.CODE_NAME ,CD.CODE_DETAIL_ID ,CD.CODE_DETAIL_NAME FROM COMMON C, COMMON_DETAIL CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID AND CD.CODE_ID = 500
